definition: to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]

sentences.english: Mary is a kind of back-seat driver.

sentences.chinese: 爺爺的老槍後坐得很厲害。

sentences.english: The experiment proved that the recoil force of the electromagnetic riveter has reduced greatly.
sentences.chinese: 實驗表明新的鉚槍結構後坐力和噪音明顯降低。

sentences.english: A gun recoils after being fired.
It was blowback operated, automatic weapon that fired from the open bolt.
sentences.chinese: 這是後坐力操作，自動武器，從開放的螺栓開槍。

sentences.english: Behind the desk in the police station sat a police captain.
sentences.chinese: 警察局裏辦公桌後坐着一位警官。

sentences.english: Shortcomings in accuracy is small, big recoil.
sentences.chinese: 缺點就是精準度小，後坐力大。

sentences.english: Recoil mechanism is the crucial part which controls the backward movement of a gun.
sentences.chinese: 駐退機是反後坐裝置中控制火炮後坐規律的關鍵部件。

sentences.english: Recoil mechanism is the crucial part which controls the backward movement of a gun.
sentences.chinese: 駐退機是反後坐裝置中控制火炮後坐規律的關鍵部件。

sentences.english: The experiment proved that the recoil force of the electromagnetic riveter has reduced greatly.
sentences.chinese: 通過試驗表明，優化後鉚槍的後坐力明顯減小。

sentences.english: The gun kicked back with great force.
Experiments show that the vibration and noise level of new riveter are decreased obviously.
sentences.chinese: 實驗表明新的鉚槍結構後坐力和噪音明顯降低。

definition: head of a flight of stairs
to have a lifeless look in one's eyes (idiom)
to follow sb closely (idiom)/to keep close to
